LanguageData.STLKR_ConsumedAnimalHemogen.label: consumed animal hemogen
LanguageData.STLKR_ConsumedAnimalHemogen.description: Animal hemogen greatly increases regeneration and combat capabilities of the feeder, but temporary sacrifice the capability to communicate with others.
LanguageData.STLKR_ConsumedCorpseHemogen.label: consumed corpse hemogen
LanguageData.STLKR_ConsumedCorpseHemogen.description: Corpse hemogen could not truly satisfy the feeder, but it will do for a while.
LanguageData.STLKR_ConsumedSanguophageHemogen.label: consumed sanguophage hemogen
LanguageData.STLKR_ConsumedSanguophageHemogen.descrip: Sanguophage hemogen gives the feeder a powerful boost to all capacities.
LanguageData.AbnormalRegeneration.label: Abnormal regeneration
LanguageData.AbnormalRegeneration.description: Regeneration-This ability makes it difficult to kill a bloodsucker. Their regeneration is high in itself compared to other living creatures, and foreign blood only speeds it up. The main feature is the combination of invisibility and regeneration - when the bloodsucker is invisible, regeneration is higher, and the damage received is weaker..
LanguageData.Fear.label: primordial horror
